c.text: Hey there...
[ Leave ]

dlg.m: Please... You don't have much time... Find my memory card!
Hey... You need to check the girls restroom so we can record the new video... Don't ask me how...
Make sure to check all corners once you're in there... I can't take any risks...
Yeah... What's up?

c.text: I heard you're friend of a dude called 'Warren'...

dlg.m: Hum... It seems someone else is also in the intel collecting business in this school...
And, yes... I know Warren, but please don't talk to me about him...

c.text: So... Uuhh... Did you need something?

dlg.m: What kind of weird question is that? Do you think I'm like... an NPC... waiting here to give you a quest?
The only reason I'm standing here is because of Warren...

c.text: A have plan to make the principal leave his office...
I found your memory card!
I'm taking pictures for the yearbook, you know...

dlg.m: Oh? You are? And I suppose you wanna me to pose for you, right?
Yes... That's exactly what a creep would say to make a girl allow him to take pictures of her...
And no... I don't trust you enough to believe your yearbook story...

c.text: Guess what... I have access to the restroom... And there's nobody there now...
See you later...

dlg.m: Huh!? Who the hell are...
Oh... It's you... The new guy... I know who you are...

c.text: Whoa... When did I get so famous?

dlg.m: Ha! You never did, boy...

c.text: You know me but I don't know you... How fair is that?

dlg.m: Ha! As fair as it gets...
I know you because I hacked the school student database and stumbled upon your file a few days ago...
Unfortunately my rootkit never fully acquired administrative rights, so I just got basic info like your name and weekly schedule...
But I won't bore you with details you don't understand...

c.text: A rootkit you said... Did you know that if you override the backdoor service flags and run it as a daemon during system initialization you might gain root access and all the info available...

dlg.m: Oh... You mean...
Oh, my... I think you're right...
I never thought I would meet someone in this school with such level of knowledge...

c.text: Yeah... I bet IT people in a school like this never install the latest security patches...

dlg.m: Of course they don't... But that doesn't mean I had it easy, smart ass...
Anyways... It's cool to finally meet someone in this school who can at least understand my hacking feats...

c.text: You hacked the school database!? Did you do that Ferris Bueller shit and decreased your absent count?

dlg.m: Urgh... Are you like those young fictional hipsters citing pop culture references way too old for their age?
I already have enough of that with Warren and Max...
And no... I only have read access to some basic information...

c.text: That's a cool feat... I wish I could do that...

dlg.m: Yeah... Unfortunately I'm not the tutor type... And my hacker ethics won't allow me to sell private information...
Well... Congratulations... We are acquaintances now... My name is ${Characters.CH_Brooke.DisplayName}...
Is that all?
That clown... He promised to help me after class with a little... problem... but...
He got cold feet on me... Making up every kind of excuse to leave me hanging here...
I bet he's just stalking Max around the school, or downloading stupid 80's movies for her or something idiotic like that...
And she said she could 'talk' with principal to help me... Like if that would solve anything...
Sigh... Those morons deserve each other... This situation makes me hate them so much...

c.text: So... You do have a problem to solve... And I'm kinda problem solver myself...

dlg.m: Sign... Yet another good samaritan...
I'm sick of telling my story and just to be let down by my 'helpers'...

c.text: We could plan a little revenge 'prank' for them later... It will make you fell much better...

then.flag: YOUR KARMA BALANCED TOWARDS THE *EVIL* SIDE

dlg.m: Oh... Uuuhh... I... I guess...
I mean... I never tried discharging my frustration on someone else... But people say it's a great feeling...
But first I have my problem to solve... After that, make them pay for leaving me for dead here...

c.text: Hey... They tried to help you, right? That's more than most people would do nowadays...

then.flag: YOUR KARMA BALANCED TOWARDS THE *GOOD* SIDE

dlg.m: Well... Can't argue with that... They are good people indeed...
I hope you meet them later... They like your kind of... karmic balance... or something like that...

c.text: Why don't you tell me what's bothering you now?
Now... Just spit it out... What's keeping you here?

dlg.m: Well... It's my... drone...
The principal caught me flying it indoors and confiscated it... I tried to tell him I was just checking if my new propellers were working but...
He started talking that bullshit about never bending the rules or whatever...
It was so embarrassing... Everybody in the hallway passing by snickering while that creepy man lectured me about 'what ties society together'...
I... I just want my drone back...

c.text: The school will give your stuff back later... A couple of days without your drone can't be so bad...
I think you're not telling me the whole story... He can't just keep your stuff forever...

dlg.m: Uuuhh... It's not exactly... my drone... I'm worried about...
It's the memory card connected to the drone I need to get back before... before...
Look... I don't want to risk having the principal snooping into my memory card, okay?
It would be really embarrassing....

c.text: Memory card... embarrassing... Hum.... I think I get it...
Yeah... I wonder what kind of content could be that card...

dlg.m: What!?! No!!! It's... it's just... evidence...
I mean... evidence of... my........ school hacking... only that...
I could get into serious trouble if the principal finds it in my memory card...

c.text: Well... Good luck... I'm sure a smart girl like you will figure a solution...

dlg.m: Oh... Thank you... I usually handle my problems by myself indeed...
And I already have a plan! It just requires a bit of your time...

c.text: Well... Don't worry anymore... I'm here to save the day... and the drone!

dlg.m: Yeah... I knew you'd say that... Another prince charming for the rescue...
But I don't have any other options... I already have a plan involving your help!
As I said earlier... I read your school schedule... I know you have meet the principal today...
All you need to do is to figure a way to distract him while you're at his office... Then find my drone...
I just need you to take the memory card and leave the drone there, or else it will be too obvious...
Yeah... I know my plan involves mostly your action, but... it's my best shot... Can you do that for me?

c.text: Of course... I'm glad I can help...
It won't be easy... I'll see what I can do...

dlg.m: Thanks! Please don't fail me like Warren... I'll be waiting here...
OMFG!! Really!?
Do you need any help?

c.text: Can you configure this app to send a spoofed message to the principal's phone?

dlg.m: Of course I can...
And I think I know what this plan of yours is about... That's a really nice idea!
So let's do it now! Get into there while I send the spoofed message!
The principal is about to receive an urgent request from someone important!

c.text: Nope... It's okay... I can do it...

dlg.m: Then why the hell you didn't put this plan into action yet!?
Come on... The clock is ticking...
You did!?!?! Oh my God!! I can't believe it!!!

c.text: It wasn't easy... I would be done if the principal caught me...

dlg.m: Yeah... I can't thank you enough... I know you took risks...

c.text: Piece of cake...

dlg.m: Yeah... I really appreciate what you did for me... Just not start getting cocky, okay...
Now, where is it? Please... Give it to me...
I can't wait to delete all that evidence...

c.text: Yeah... About that... I, uuhhh...
Sure... Let me just take it off my phone...

n.item: YOU GAVE THE MEMORY CARD BACK TO BROOKE

dlg.m: Wait... You plugged it into your phone!?!?!

c.text: Oups...
Yep...

dlg.m: No... no... no... I can't believe it...
You... You watched it... Didn't you?
This is so embarrassing... Why... Why did you do that!?!?

c.text: Well... You never said to NOT do it...

dlg.m: I... I never... said...
It... It should be...
Sigh... Yeah... I should have made that clear...

c.text: I needed a safe place to keep the card...

dlg.m: Really!?! That's the best excuse you came up with!?!
Why don't you admit you were looking exactly for what you found... Like a damned pervert...
Sigh... I should know men are all the same...

c.text: I can't miss the opportunity to check a girl's "digital content" when she willingly handles it to me...

then.flag: YOUR KARMA BALANCED TOWARDS THE *EVIL* SIDE

dlg.m: But... but... I didn't say you could...
Sigh... At least you're honest... It's better than coming up with some stupid excuse...
I should have known that could happen... It was a rookie's security mistake...
I guess it would be much worse if the principal were the one who found it...

c.text: You're accepting the situation surprisingly well, like if you wanted me to watch your clip all along... Did you want someone's opinion on your performance?

dlg.m: What!? My... performance!?!
No... I... I was just trying to...

c.text: Whatever you were trying, you did great... Your figure is quite... photogenic...
No need to be shy... Every girl love posing to a camera, and you definitely have the talent and the assets...

dlg.m: Oh...
Do... Do you think so...
I mean... Just... Let me explain...

c.text: Hey... I don't judge... Women are free to do whatever they want with their bodies, right?

dlg.m: Oh... Yes... Of course...
I mean... What you said was really cool...
And I... I never thought you'd have such mature ideas, but...
I guess it's good to be wrong about people, sometimes...
But... Let me explain what that stupid clip is about...
Have you heard about deep fake videos? My plan was to create one... A deep fake video of Victoria flashing her boobs at the school restroom...
I recorded myself doing the deed in the actual restroom as the background source, and was going to blend her face and hair over mine...
Do you get it what I want? That bitch would be in some well deserved trouble if that kind of video of her went viral and ended up in the school staff radar...
That would teach her to not mess with me...
Unfortunately... Those deep fake programs are not as straightforward as I thought...
I never managed to make them work with the video I recorded... I'm still trying to figure the problem...

c.text: Maybe the problem is the bad lightning setup of the restroom...

dlg.m: Nah... That lightning is good enough and it's easily corrected by software...

c.text: Maybe the problem is the poor camera lens quality of the phone...

dlg.m: Nah... That's what a snobby "professional" photographer would think...

c.text: Maybe the problem is the camera position and movement in the video...

dlg.m: Do that creepy Mr. Jefferson also teach about digital video in his classes?
Because... Yeah... I also think that's the problem with the clip I recorded...
You see... The deep fake software works better when the image has slow movement and people's faces not very close to the lens...
But it's not easy to shot a video like that of yourself in a selfie style...

c.text: What if 'someone' went with you to the restroom to help record that video with the perfect deep fake conditions?

dlg.m: Yeah... It would seem like some of Victoria's stupid friends were the one recording... And the framing and movement would be perfect for the software to...
Wait a minute... 'Someone' means YOU!?!?! Recording me while I...
You're really pushing your luck, boy...

c.text: Uuhh... My only intent is to help with your genius plan against Victoria... That bitch deserves it...

dlg.m: Jesus Christ... I can smell the bullshit exhaling from your words...

c.text: You need someone you can trust for that don't you... Don't I showed you can trust me by finding your memory card?

dlg.m: You sticked my memory card in your phone and watched an intimate video of mine... Is that what you think that would inspire trust!?!?!
Sigh... But you know what... Actually I think you're the only person I know in this school that can help me make this plan work...
Max would never agree to help with that...
and Warren... Uurhg... not in a million years...
I can't believe in what I'm about to say, but...
Would you please check if the girl's restroom is empty? I can't be seen lurking around there now...
If there's no one there, then we can come in quickly to... record a better background video...

c.text: I'm even more happy to help this time...
The school's top camera man is at your service, miss Brooke...
Guess what... I've already been at the girls restroom... And it's totally empty now...

dlg.m: Yeah... Just shut up and go now before I decide to kill myself...
Really?!? That's awesome!!!
I mean... It's not like I'm eager to get in there with you...
I just... I just need to record the video template properly...
Well... I must do what is need to be done...
I'm going to the restroom now... Please, give it a minute before coming in... I don't wanna risk people seeing us walking in there together...
This is going to be interesting...
